overview: Help with childcare costs as part of student finance - what you'll get, eligibility, how to claim
title: Childcare Grant

table.body:
Full-time higher education students with children can apply for a Childcare Grant of up to £255 a week. The grant helps with childcare costs for children under 15, or under 17 if they have special educational needs.

^You can apply for this grant on top of any other student finance and you don’t have to pay it back.
table.title: Overview

table.body:
The maximum Childcare Grant is £148.75 a week for one child, or up to £255 for 2 or more children.

The amount you’ll get depends on:

- your household income  
- the cost of your childcare 
- the number of children who are dependent on you

The money is paid in 3 instalments over each term directly into your bank account.

Income-related, unemployment, and housing benefits are not affected by a Childcare Grant.
table.title: What you'll get

table.body:
##How to qualify

To qualify for a Childcare Grant the following has to apply:

- you must live in England
- you must study full-time in higher education in England
- the children listed in the grant application must be financially dependent on you
- your childcare provider must be on the [Ofsted Early Years Register or General Childcare Register](http://www.ofsted.gov.uk/early-years-and-childcare "Ofsted Early Years Register or General Childcare Register"){:rel="external"} - check with your provider
- if your child is cared for at home by a nurse or agency worker, they must be registered with the [Care Quality Commission](http://www.cqc.org.uk/ "Care Qualify Commission"){:rel="external"} (other types of care might also qualify, check with Student Finance England)

##Who can't apply

You can’t apply for a Childcare Grant if:

- your child is covered by the free care that all 3 and 4 year olds are entitled to (15 hours a week)  
- your child is cared for by a relative or your partner mainly in the child's home (even if the relative or partner are registered child minders)  
- you or your partner are claiming the childcare element of Working Tax Credits
table.title: Eligibility

table.body:
To apply for a Childcare Grant follow these steps:

s1. As part of your [main student finance application](http://www.studentfinance.direct.gov.uk/portal/page?_pageid=153,4680119&_dad=portal&_schema=PORTAL "main student finance application"){:rel="external"} fill in the Childcare Grant sections
s2. Either fill in the form you are sent or [download 'Childcare Grant application CCG1' form (PDF, 259KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/@educ/documents/digitalasset/dg_200343.pdf "Download 'Childcare Grant application form' CCG1 (PDF, 170KB)" ) and send it to Student Finance England - you’ll have to give estimates of your childcare costs
s3. Student Finance England will send you a letter telling you how much Childcare Grant you’re entitled to
s4. At the end of each term you and your childcare provider have to confirm your actual childcare costs - [Download 'Childcare costs confirmation CCG2' form (PDF, 164KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/@educ/documents/digitalasset/dg_199940.pdf "Download 'Childcare costs confirmation CCG2' form (PDF, 164KB)" )
s5. If the actual childcare costs are higher or lower than your estimates given in the application form, Student Finance England will adjust your next payment

table.title: How to claim

table.body:
##Documents you might need to send with your application

After Student Finance England has assessed your application, they might ask you to provide further information, such as:

- photocopies of P60s
- Child Benefit details
- family tax credit details
- your child's original birth certificate
- photocopies of evidence of financial commitments for you or your partner, eg bank statements

If you need help contact the Student Finance England Helpline.

$C**Student Finance England Helpline**

**Telephone:** 0845 300 50 90    
**Minicom:** 0845 604 44 34$C
